name: SIGMA
description: $Sigma Coin, often simply called Sigma, is a community-driven cryptocurrency that embodies the ethos of the "sigma" personality archetype-typically characterized as independent, self-reliant, and unconcerned with social hierarchies. Aiming to appeal to individuals who value autonomy and empowerment, $Sigma Coin positions itself as a decentralized asset that encourages financial sovereignty outside traditional systems. Its community emphasizes resilience, privacy, and freedom, appealing to those who wish to transcend conventional financial limitations. By fostering an ecosystem where members can connect and collaborate without central control, $Sigma aims to create a unique, self-sustaining environment for people who resonate with the "lone wolf" mentality.
